Question
========
For a Mixed Design ANOVA examining whether the performance of schoolchildren differs between 3 subjects (literature, essay writing, mathematics) and whether those differences vary between male and female students, two assumptions about the variances are apply: the homogeneity of variances and sphericity.  
  
The assumption of sphericity implies, among other things, that the variance of \__________ **...** is equal to the variance of __________ **...** .

Answerlist
----------
* The scores of women in each of the three boxes \The scores of men in each of the three boxes
* Women's scores in each of the three subjects \Scores in mathematics - scores in essay writing
* Scores in literature - scores in mathematics \Scores of men in each of the three subjects
* Scores in literature - scores in mathematics \Scores in mathematics - scores in essay writing

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
